text:
A special placement camp will be held under the Tamil Nadu State Rural Livelihood Mission will be held on February 6. In a press release issued here on Sunday, Collector S. Ganesh said the unemployed youth in the age group of 18 to 35 years from Pudukottai, Tirumayam, Ponnamaravathy, Gandarvakottai, Kakrambakudi and Tiruvarankulam blocks can take part in the camp.

Prizes distributed

Housing Minister R. Vaithilingam gave away prizes to 350 students who won in various contests, organised by the Adi Dravidar Welfare Department, here on Saturday as part of Humanness Week celebrations. Collector N. Subbaiyan presided.

Basketball competition

Regional-level basketball competition was held here on Saturday. Players from Tiruchi, Nagapattinam, Pudukottai, Dindigul, Perambalur and Ariyalur districts participated in it. Housing Minister R. Vaithilingam gave away prizes to winners.
title: Placement camp
